#id=1
#text=My hair was really long and I needed to get it cut .
#id=2
#text=My mom called the hair salon and made an appointment for me .
#id=3
#text=We went into the salon and the receptionist asked us for our name .
#id=4
#text=We told her what it was and she marked our names off in her book .
#id=5
#text=A lady came and took me to an area where there were some really deep sinks .
#id=6
#text=She told me to lie back with my neck on the edge of the sink and my hair falling into the sink .
#id=7
#text=She washed my hair with warm water and some nice smelling shampoo .
#id=8
#text=She put a towel on my hair to dry it and took me to a special chair .
#id=9
#text=The chair had a foot pump that the lady used to raise the chair way up in the air .
#text=When it was up high enough for me to look into the mirror , she put a cape around my shoulders and began combing out my hair .
#text=She took out some scissors and used them to cut my hair into a nice style .
#text=I was very surprised to find that it did not hurt one bit !
#text=She dried my hair with the blow dryer and then it was finished .
#text=I was very happy with my new look .
